TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StylusPlugIn extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示可添加到控件的 属性中的插件。

span.span: Represents a plug-in that can be added to a control's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许你操纵单独线程上的对象。The allows you to manipulate objects on separate threads. 单独的线程所用的因此墨迹仍将呈现为触笔输入数据即使应用程序执行其他操作。Separate threads are used so that the ink still renders as the tablet pen inputs data even if the application is doing something else. 若要截获与硬件的触笔接触点，创建继承自的类类。To intercept stylus points from the hardware, create a class that inherits from the class. 类具有以下方法，你可以重写操作该钢笔中的线程上的对象的线程池。The class has the following methods that you can override to manipulate objects on a thread in the pen thread pool. - - - - - 笔输入路由到元素的笔线程上。The pen's input is routed to an element's on the pen thread. 因为无法对笔线程执行准确的命中测试，所以某些元素偶尔可能会收到适用于其他元素的触笔输入。Since accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements. 如果你需要确保在执行操作之前已正确路由输入，订阅并执行中的操作， ，或方法。If you need to make sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, subscribe to and perform the operation in the , , or method. 在执行准确的命中测试后，主应用程序线程将调用这些方法。These methods are invoked by the main application thread after accurate hit-testing has been performed. 若要订阅对这些方法，调用的方法中，在钢笔线程上发生的方法。To subscribe to these methods, call the method in the method that occurs on the pen thread. 例如，如果你调用中、时发生。For example, if you call in , the occurs. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用在控件中，你应测试插件和控制广泛以确保它们不会引发任何意外的异常。If you use a inside a control, you should test the plug-in and control extensively to make sure they do not throw any unintended exceptions. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类不常在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个自定义约束在控件上的某些区域墨迹。The following example creates a custom that constrains the ink to a certain area on the control. [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/FilterPlugin.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/FilterPlugin.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 钢笔线程，此方法发生时要因此尽量少使用此方法，以免影响性能。This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写方法。The following example demonstrates how to override the method. 若要创建墨迹限制到特定区域，请参阅概述。To create a that restricts ink to a certain area, see the overview.
